Uses of Interface
dataaccess.Dao

    • Uses of Dao in dataaccess

      Methods in dataaccess with parameters of type Dao 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DataAccess.atomicRead(Dao dao)
      Performs a single read (SELECT) operation.
      void DataAccess.createConnection(Dao dao)
      This method starts the data access interaction and permits the use of transactions.
      java.lang.Integer DataAccess.deleteWithinTransaction(Dao dao)
      Convenience method to wrap a single delete operation in a transaction.
      java.lang.Integer DataAccess.saveWithinTransaction(Dao dao)
      Convenience method to wrap a single save operation in a transaction.
